about_the_game:
Step back in time to explore the remarkable life, teachings, and conduct of Muhammad, the Prophet of Islam, in this immersive narrative-driven puzzle game. Inspired by the acclaimed "Case of the Golden Idol," this unique experience offers a blend of historical storytelling, mystery-solving, and moral exploration.

Dive into a richly detailed world that brings 7th-century Arabia to life through stunning visuals, captivating stories, and challenging puzzles. As a seeker of truth, your mission is to unravel key events, uncover hidden meanings, and piece together the Prophet’s exemplary character through his actions, decisions, and relationships.

Features:

Engaging Historical Mysteries: Solve intricate puzzles based on real events and authentic historical accounts.

Explore a Timeless Legacy: Learn about Muhammad’s principles of compassion, justice, and wisdom through interactive storytelling.

Immersive Worldbuilding: Experience an era of pivotal change with beautifully crafted environments and characters.

Accessible and Educational: Designed for players of all backgrounds, offering both entertainment and insight into a remarkable life.
